claims: Former NFL quarterback Kurt Warner married a woman who had two children, one a special needs child.
The early TV sitcom Mary Kay and Johnny was the first television series to portray a married couple who slept in the same bed.
Photograph shows Barack Obama without his hand over his heart while the U.S. national anthem is being played.
Some travelers may no longer be able to use their driver's licenses to board airplanes after 1 October 2020 due to the REAL ID Act.
A sheriff attributed a suspect's being shot 68 times to "that's all  the bullets we had."
